headline: Should You Reconsider Costco’s Value After Strong March Sales Update?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Costco Wholesale shares? You are not alone, and it is a good question to ask. Whether you are holding, buying, or simply watching from the sidelines, the conversation around Costco is as heated as ever. Despite a relatively modest 0.5% rise over the past week and a small dip of -0.4% in the past month, the stock is still up 6.4% year-to-date and has more than doubled over the past three years, with a staggering 212.6% gain in five years. This kind of long-term...

headline: Evercore ISI Reiterates Buy Rating on Costco (COST) with $1,060 PT Ahead of Q4 Earnings
summary: Costco Wholesale Corporation (NASDAQ:COST) is one of the stocks to invest in before they split next. On September 5, Greg Melich from Evercore ISI kept a Buy rating on Costco, with a price target of $1,060. Evercore ISI’s sentiment was reiterated ahead of Costco’s Q4 2025 earnings report. In Q3 2025, Costco reported strong growth […]
